com.solacesystems.solclientj.core

Class Solclient.GLOBAL_PROPERTIES

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solacesystems.solclientj.core.Solclient.GLOBAL_PROPERTIES
  • Enclosing class:
    Solclient

    public static final class Solclient.GLOBAL_PROPERTIES
extends Object
    Global Configuration Properties. Items that can be configured globally for an API instance. Global properties are set in Solclient.init(). Global properties may not be changed after this, they exist for the duration of the API instance. Note that the data buffer sizes for quantas 0 through 4 must be in increasing order of size.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DBQUANTASIZE_0
      The size (in bytes) of data buffers in the pool of smallest buffers.
      static String DBQUANTASIZE_1
      The size (in bytes) of data buffers in the second pool of buffers.
      static String DBQUANTASIZE_2
      The size (in bytes) of data buffers in the third pool of buffers.
      static String DBQUANTASIZE_3
      The size (in bytes) of data buffers in the fourth pool of buffers.
      static String DBQUANTASIZE_4
      The size (in bytes) of data buffers in the fifth (last) pool of buffers.
      static String GSS_KRB_LIB
      The GSS Kerberos library name.
      Default: Operation System dependent: Linux - "libgssapi_krb5.so.2" Windows - "secur32.dll"
      static String MAXPOOLMEM
      The maximum amount of memory (in bytes) the API can save in its data and message pools.
      Once it reaches this size, data blocks are released back to the heap and are not kept in a API pool.
      The valid range is > 0.
      Default: 1073741824 (1 GB)
